work.name: Lloyds Bank

Built trading-facing Excel VBA tool to interpolate and calibrate FX option implied volatilities across arbitrary maturities using Malz model for smile construction

work.name: Qube Research and Technologies

Optimized position sizing and signal accuracy through aggregation, scaling, and exponential smoothing
Utilized Hierarchical Clustering with SENT-BERT embeddings on revenue data to categorize 560 companies across sectors (crude oil, petroleum, agriculture, metals, textiles, automotive, steel)
